item.title: Danielle add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Joshilyn Jackson
item.description: "There are gods in Alabama: Jack Daniel's, high school quarterbacks, trucks, big tits, and also Jesus." -- Joshilyn Jackson

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Everyone knows you can't see death cooties. Take my word for it, that couch has the biggest, fattest death cooties that ever existed. That couch has the mother of all death cooties. â€“ Lula " -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Is that a bulletproof vest? See, now that's so insulting. That's like saying I'm not smart enough to shoot you in the head." Eddie DeChooch" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Helen Fielding
item.description: "I will not fall for any of the following: alcoholics, workaholics, commitment phobics, people with girlfriends or wives, misogynists, megalomanics, chauvists, emotional fuckwits or freeloaders, perverts." -- Helen Fielding

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Jen Lancaster
item.description: "You want to change? Lose the bitch. Be nicer to people. Stop telling them to "bite you" and threatening to kick them until they're dead." -- Jen Lancaster

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Stephanie Klein
item.description: "Tell the truth, or someone will tell it for you." -- Stephanie Klein

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Jen Lancaster
item.description:
"If you're anorexic, you're doing it wrong."
I swat him with a dish towel. "No, no, I mean anorexics look in the mirror, and even if they're eighty pounds, they still see a fat girl. I'm a hundred pounds heavier than I was in high school, my veins are full of creme fraiche, and yet I look in the mirror, take in the hair and makeup, and think, Damn, baby, you fiiine." -- Jen Lancaster

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Chelsea Handler
item.description: "There are two kinds of people I don't trust: people who don't drink and people who collect stickers." -- Chelsea Handler

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Garth Stein
item.description: "That which we manifest is before us; we are the creators of our own destiny. Be it through intention or ignorance, our successes and our failures have been brought on by none other than ourselves." -- Garth Stein

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Garth Stein
item.description: "Somewhere, the zebra is dancing." -- Garth Stein

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Things are never as bad as they seem." -- Harper Lee
